comments.content:
Using the OpenStreetMapViewItemizedOverlayWithFocus (and OpenStreetMapViewItemizedOverlay) crashes, if it is being used without a ResourceProxy implementation. It references the following resources:

marker_default_focused_base
marker_default

both images are missing in the jar file in the download area and in SVN, they should be copied from the OsmStreetMapViewer/res/drawable folder.

greetings,

Martin
This issue was closed by revision r244.
